# Copilot Instructions for RogueWordsInfo

## About This Repository

This repository contains privacy policies and informational documentation for the RogueWords game. The focus is on clear, accurate, and legally compliant documentation.

## General Guidelines

- Write clear, concise, and user-friendly documentation
- Ensure all legal and privacy information is accurate and up-to-date
- Follow standard documentation best practices
- Use proper grammar and spelling

## Documentation Standards

- Use Markdown format for all documentation files
- Include descriptive headings and proper document structure
- Break long documents into sections with clear headings
- Use bullet points and numbered lists for clarity
- Keep language accessible to non-technical users

## File Organization

- Place privacy-related documents in appropriately named files
- Use descriptive file names (e.g., `privacy-policy.md`, `terms-of-service.md`)
- Keep the README.md file updated with links to important documents
- Maintain a clean and organized file structure

## Content Requirements

- Ensure privacy policies comply with relevant regulations (GDPR, CCPA, etc.)
- Include all required legal disclosures
- Keep contact information current
- Date all policy documents and track revisions
- Be transparent about data collection and usage

## Pull Request Guidelines

- Provide clear descriptions of documentation changes
- Highlight any significant policy updates or additions
- Review changes carefully for accuracy and completeness
- Ensure proper formatting and no broken links
- Small, focused changes are preferred over large rewrites

## Testing and Validation

- Preview Markdown files to ensure proper rendering
- Check all internal and external links
- Verify that contact information and dates are current
- Ensure consistency in terminology throughout documents
- Review for typos and grammatical errors
